Feb. 25, 2012 D Valley Entertainment Contest (Championship Brass)
Valley Entertainment Contest (Championship Brass) 1 Entertainments Contest Valley Entertainment Contest valley-entertainment-contest-championship-brass
Valley Hotel, Fivemiletown, County Tyrone, Northern Ireland, UK Most Entertaining: Laganvale (Metal Technology) Band Best March: The Mad Major, 1st Old Boys Association Silver Band Best Soloist: Brendan Coyle - Trombone, Downshire Brass
*The band with the highest Music placing was awarded first place*
Aug. 22, 2011, 1:10 p.m. Feb. 28, 2012, 6:01 p.m.
1 1st Old Boys Association Band (Belfast) Stephen Cairns

3 Downshire Brass Michael Alcorn
